--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Thanks, that's the kind of describing i'm going for this 
character
> :)
> 
> Wildrider's grin stops after he's banged knuckles. He looks at
> Blindchaos, and looks disgusted at first, then begins to contemplate
> what's happening. Then he looks a bit disturbed.

::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::

    Wildrider's disturbed look only makes Blindchaos's grin bigger.
    Domnijoe withheld a fit of snikering.
    "See what I mean about his grinning?" she said. "However, I 
suggest you guys get to tolerate it. You don't want to be looking up 
at it as he pulls your fuel pump out."
    Blindchaos winks.
    "I have a bit of a temper."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
